entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: Strilath Farles misled you...he doesn't remember where the Meatlump hideout is.
entries.journal_entry_description: Vani Korr has asked you to find a way into the Meatlump Hideout. First, you must find out where it is. To that end, you are doing a favor for a Meatlump lieutenant named Strilath Farles in exchange for information.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Some Ragtags have been giving Strilath trouble. He wants you to take them out and especially their gang leader, Mramo Gurah.
entries.task02_item_name: The stash of stolen goods has been destroyed
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Mramo tried to bribe you by giving up their stash of stolen goods. It's hidden nearby...go destroy it
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Speak with Strilath. Use one of the Meatlump radios in Doaba Guerfel to call him.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Strilath admited that he can't remember where the Meatlump Hideout is. He thought it was in Doaba Guerfel, but cant find it. Return to Vani Korr with the bad news.
entries.task06_start_message: The radio sends a signal when switched on and then shuts back down.
entries.task06_utterance_wave_1: Hang on, I'm on my way...
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Defeat some of the Ragtag goons in Mramo Gurah's gang.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Defeat Mramo Gurah, a ragtag gang leader.
